phrs.translation: 干净利索, 干净的, 有干净习惯的, 爱清洁的
纯洁而自由, 她永远是我的, 她永远是我的“纯洁”与“自由
提出了干净, 引发干净
用作副词时意思是“利索地, 用作形容词时, 有干净习惯的, 整齐地

sentences.sentence: These molecules burn more cleanly than gasoline, in part because they have fewer, if any, carbon-carbon bonds, and the hydrocarbons they do emit are less likely to generate ozone.
sentences.translation: 这些分子燃烧起来比汽油更干净，部分原因是它们的碳-碳键更少（如果有的话），而且它们排放的碳氢化合物不太可能产生臭氧。

sentences.sentence: These molecules burn more cleanly than gasoline, in part because they have fewer, if and, carbon-carbon bonds, and the hydrocarbons they do emit are less likely to generate ozone.
sentences.translation: 这些分子燃烧起来比汽油更清洁，部分原因是它们的碳-碳键更少或者不存在，而且它们排放的碳氢化合物产生臭氧的可能性更小。

sentences.sentence: The game had been cleanly fought.
